foreignData.text: {T}: Le terrain ciblé devient une forêt jusqu'à la fin du tour.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Forest until end of turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: The kavu evolved for centuries deep inside Dominaria, and some can draw from its strength.

foreignData.name: Kavu-Kundschafter
foreignData.text: Der Kavu-Kundschafter erhält +1/+0 für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die Du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText: Des siècles durant, les kavrus ont évolué sous la surface de Dominaria, et certains savent user des forces telluriques.
foreignData.name: Éclaireur kavru
foreignData.text: L'Éclaireur kavru gagne +1/+0 pour chaque type de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.

mainBoard.name: Kavu Scout
mainBoard.originalText: Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

mainBoard.text: Domain — Kavu Scout gets +1/+0 for each basic land type among lands you control.

foreignData.name: Magnigoth-Baumhirten
foreignData.text: Für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die Du kontrollierst, haben die Magnigoth-Baumhirten Landtarnung dieses Typs. (Sie sind unblockbar, solange der verteidigende Spieler ein Land dieses Typs kontrolliert.)

foreignData.name: Sylvin magnigoth
foreignData.text: Le Sylvin magnigoth a la traversée des terrains de tous les types dont vous contrôlez un terrain de base. (Il est imblocable tant que le joueur défenseur contrôle au moins un terrain de ce type.)

For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. mainBoard.name: Quirion Dryad
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you play a white, blue, black, or red spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Quirion Dryad.

rulings.text: Quirion Dryad’s ability will trigger only once per spell you cast, as long as that spell is at least one of the listed colors.
Quirion Dryad’s ability will trigger if you cast a spell that’s green and at least one of the listed colors.

mainBoard.name: Confound
mainBoard.originalText:
Counter target spell that targets one or more creatures.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Confound doesn’t resolve if the targeted spell has been countered or does not still target one or more permanents that are still creatures and are still on the battlefield. Confound is different from other such spells in that it actually specifies that the spell must target a creature, not just be able to target a creature or that the spell has a certain number of targets.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Harrow
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to play Harrow, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: The sacrifice of a land is part of the cost of casting Harrow. You can’t pay this cost more than once to get a multiple effect.
The two lands do not count toward your normal one land you can play each turn.
Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

mainBoard.text:

mainBoard.name: Worldly Counsel
mainBoard.originalText: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

rulings.text: You choose the order on the bottom of your library.

To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

mainBoard.name: Allied Strategies
mainBoard.originalText: Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.

rulings.text: You draw one card per basic land type, not for each basic land. This makes it a maximum of 5 cards.

To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

mainBoard.text: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands they control.

foreignData.name: Darigaaz' Atem
foreignData.text:
Bonus {2} (Du kannst zusätzlich {2} bezahlen, wenn Du diesen Zauberspruch spielst.)
Darigaaz' Atem fügt jeder nichtfliegenden Kreatur und jedem Spieler 1 Schadenspunkt zu. Wenn Du die Bonuskosten bezahlt hast, fügt Darigaaz' Atem stattdessen jeder nichtfliegenden Kreatur und jedem Spieler 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignData.name: Souffle de Darigaaz
foreignData.text:
Kick {2} (Vous pouvez payer {2} supplémentaires quand vous jouez ce sort.)
Le Souffle de Darigaaz inflige 1 blessure à chaque créature sans le vol et à chaque joueur. Si vous avez payé le coût de kick, le Souffle de Darigaaz inflige 4 blessures à chaque créature sans le vol et à chaque joueur à la place.

mainBoard.name: Breath of Darigaaz
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker o2 (You may pay an additional o2 as you play this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If you paid the kicker cost, Breath of Darigaaz deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.
mainBoard.text:
Kicker {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell.)
Breath of Darigaaz deals 1 damage to each creature without flying and each player. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Do not fear death. I shall release you from the eternal bonds and bring you glory." —Lord Dralnu

foreignData.flavorText: „Fürchte Dich nicht vor dem Tod. Ich werde Dich von den Fesseln der Ewigkeit befreien und Dich zu Ruhm führen." —Lord Dralnu
foreignData.name: Exotische Seuche
foreignData.text: Ein Spieler Deiner Wahl verliert X Lebenspunkte und Du gewinnst X Lebenspunkte dazu, wobei X gleich der Anzahl der Standardlandtypen unter den Ländern, die Du kontrollierst, ist.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ne crains pas la mort. Je te délivrerai des liens éternels et t'apporterai la gloire. » — Le seigneur Dralnu.
foreignData.name: Maladie exotique
foreignData.text: Le joueur ciblé perd X points de vie et vous gagnez X points de vie, X étant le nombre de types de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.

mainBoard.name: Exotic Disease
mainBoard.originalText: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. mainBoard.text: Domain — Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Birds reach all parts of the world," said Barrin. "They will make excellent scouts."

foreignData.flavorText: „Vögel erreichen jeden Teil der Welt," sagte Barrin. „Sie werden hervorragende Späher abgeben."
foreignData.name: Geordnete Vogelzüge
foreignData.text: Bringe für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die Du kontrollierst, einen 1/1 blauen Vogelspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les oiseaux vont partout », dit Barrin. « Ils feront d'excellents éclaireurs. »
foreignData.name: Migration programmée
foreignData.text: Mettez en jeu un jeton de créature 1/1 bleue avec le vol Oiseau pour chaque type de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.

mainBoard.name: Ordered Migration
mainBoard.originalText: Put a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying into play for each basic land type among lands you control.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don’t count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you’ll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

mainBoard.text: Domain — Create a 1/1 blue Bird creature token with flying for each basic land type among lands you control.

foreignData.name: Erstes Ergrünen
foreignData.text:
Bonus—opfere eine Kreatur. (Du kannst zusätzlich eine Kreatur opfern, wenn Du diesen Zauberspruch spielst.)
Durchsuche Deine Bibliothek nach einem Standardland Deiner Wahl und bringe diese Karte ins Spiel. Mische danach Deine Bibliothek. Wenn Du die Bonuskosten bezahlt hast, durchsuche Deine Bibliothek stattdessen nach zwei Standardländern und bringe sie ins Spiel. Mische danach Deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Croissance primordiale
foreignData.text:
Kick - Sacrifiez une créature. (Vous pouvez sacrifier une créature en supplément de tous autres coûts quand vous jouez ce sort.)
Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez cette carte en jeu, puis mélangez votre bibliothèque. Si vous avez payé le coût de kick, cherchez à la place deux cartes de terrain de base dans votre bibliothèque, mettez-les en jeu, puis mélangez votre bibliothèque.

mainBoard.name: Primal Growth
mainBoard.originalText:
Kicker—Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you play this spell.)
Search your library for a basic land card, put that card into play, then shuffle your library. If you paid the kicker cost, instead search your library for two basic land cards, put them into play, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You may choose not to find any basic lands when you search.
Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

mainBoard.text:
Kicker—Sacrifice a creature. (You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If this spell was kicked, instead search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

mainBoard.flavorText: "Fire is the universal language." —Jhoira, master artificer

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Sprache des Feuers versteht jeder." —Jhoira, Meisterbastler
foreignData.name: Stammesflammen
foreignData.text: Die Stammesflammen fügen einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl X Schadenspunkte zu, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an verschiedenen Standardlandtypen unter den Ländern, die Du kontrollierst, ist.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le feu est le langage du monde. » — Djoïra, maîtresse artificière.
foreignData.name: Flammes tribales
foreignData.text: Ces Flammes tribales infligent X blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur, X étant le nombre de types de terrains de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.

mainBoard.name: Tribal Flames

mainBoard.text: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

foreignData.flavorText: „Dominaria berührt uns alle." —Molimo, Maro-Hexer
foreignData.name: Wandernder Fluß
foreignData.text: Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte für jeden Standardlandtyp unter den Ländern, die Du kontrollierst, dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le toucher de Dominaria est sur nous tous. » — Molimo, maro-sorcier.
foreignData.name: Ruisseau vagabond
foreignData.text: Vous gagnez 2 points de vie pour chaque type de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.

mainBoard.name: Wandering Stream
mainBoard.originalText: You gain 2 life for each basic land type among lands you control.
